food.title: Where can I eat?
food.desc: Hoi An is not just famous for its ancient beauty that has been recognized many times worldwide but also for its authentic cuisine

more_info.name: The Temple Restaurant
more_info.location: 132 Hùng Vương, Phường Cẩm Phổ, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Inspired by Western Europe, our fine dining international fusion restaurant and lounge bar embraces exceptional culinary diversity from around the globe.
more_info.menu: Bar, Fast Food, Pub, Vegetarian Friendly, Gluten Free Options, Vegan Options

more_info.name: Aubergine49 Restaurant
more_info.location: 49 Lý Thái Tổ, Sơn Phong, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Aubergine49 is a modern European fine dining establishment situated a short distance from the UNESCO ancient town of Hoi An. We are the first restaurant of this style of dining in the area. Here at Aubergine49, we believe that giving you a quality experience is of upmost importance. From our locally sourced produce to our finest imported ingredients we are proud to present to you our Eurasian inspired dishes.
more_info.menu: French, European, Asian, Contemporary, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Herbs And Spices Restaurant
more_info.location: 2/6 Lê Lợi, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Unlike other restaurants or cooking classes that you will find in Hoi An, Herbs and Spices Cooking School is only taking small groups for hands on experiences. We are catering for all levels of skill, age and experience.
more_info.menu: Asian, Vietnamese, International, Fusion, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Shore Club An Bang Beach
more_info.location: Hai Bà Trưng, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Absolute beach front dining and reviving. Ready to tantalise your taste buds 7 days a week from 7am till late.
more_info.menu: International, Vietnamese, Seafood, Fusion, Vegetarian Friendly, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Restaurant & Cafe Tuan
more_info.location: 170 Trần Nhân Tông, Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Come and dine at Tuan Restaurant & Cafe. We offer a variety of delicious food from the west and from right here in Hoi An. Pizza, burgers, and more!
more_info.menu: Italian, Pizza, European, Asian, Vietnamese, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Simple Bar and Restaurant (Rose's kitchen)
more_info.location: Âu Cơ, Cửa Đại, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Simple restaurant is a restaurant that has a great gastronomic space with a fine combination of Asian cuisine culture and bold beauty of Vietnam.
more_info.menu: Seafood, European, Asian, Vietnamese, Gastropub, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Rosie's cafe
more_info.location: 8/6 Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Rosie’s Café on Nguyen Thi Minh Khai Street, just up the alley from Nu Eatery, is a delightful marriage of Vietnamese coffee tradition and modern aesthetics. Rosie’s offers a wide selection of coffee beverages and fresh juices along with a calm, cool space to have a chat, read, or work.
more_info.menu: Cafe, International, Healthy, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: French Bakery and Restaurant
more_info.location: Cẩm An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: French and Vietnamese food in an outdoor setting. At An Bang Beach Village we serve breakfast, lunch and dinner 7 days a week.
more_info.menu: French, Vietnamese, Cafe, Asian, Vegetarian Friendly, Gluten Free Options, Vegan Options

more_info.name: Tra Que Garden Cooking Class & Restaurant
more_info.location: Hai Bà Trưng, Cẩm Hà, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Spending a half-day of living, working, and cooking with the local people in the Organic vegetable village will be a great chance for you to discover the daily life of the farmers and of course to become a “real local chef”!
more_info.menu: Asian, Vietnamese, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options, Vegetarian Friendly

more_info.name: Nhan's Kitchen
more_info.location: 167 Trần Nhân Tông, Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: In Hoi An it’s common for the cheaper restaurants to have huge pizza sections. These orders are sub-contracted to third parties.Nhan’s Kitchen make their own however, and they’re surprisingly good; quite possibly the best pizza value-for-money in town. Try the Four Cheeses Pizza on for size at just 80,000 VND!
more_info.menu: Italian, Bar, Pizza, Asian, Vietnamese, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

place.title: Where can I visit?
place.desc: Hoi An has a lot of places to see and things to do, you will never be bored

more_info.name: An Bang Beach
more_info.location: Hai Bà Trưng, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Tranquil, tree-lined beach featuring white sand, palapas, lounge chairs & eateries.

more_info.name: Fukian Assembly Hall
more_info.location: 46 Trần Phú, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Each of the many animal statues in this stunning meeting hall symbolize some life quality such as wisdom, longevity and nobility; Chinese merchants from the Phuc Kien province built this structure in 1697.

more_info.name: Lune Performing Center Hoi An
more_info.location: Công viên Đồng Hiệp, Phố cổ, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Known for A O Show, My Village, Teh Dar, and The Mist, spectacles that charm audience in Saigon, Hanoi, and 4 continents around the world, Lune Production now comes to Hoi An. Our own established venue, Lune Performing Center Hoi An, begins welcoming local and international guests to amazing cultural expreriences from January 2018.

more_info.name: Van Duc Pagoda
more_info.location: Cẩm Hà, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Van Duc, one of the largest pagodas in Hoi An, is home to monks who are sometimes happy to give you a quick tour of the pagoda and its grounds.

more_info.name: Japanese Covered Bridge
more_info.location: Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: A local favorite, construction on this covered bridge began in the Year of the Monkey (1593) and was finished in the Year of the Dog (1595), hence the monkey and dog sculptures at either end.

more_info.name: The Old House of Phung Hung
more_info.location: 4 Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: With over 100 years old, the Phung Hung House has a unique structure with high wooden logs and broad corridors, reflecting the development of architecture and the interplay of Asian architectural styles in Hoi An in the past centuries.

more_info.name: Tra Que Village
more_info.location: Cẩm Hà, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Tra Que is a charming little village on the edge of Hoi An, the village is named after the sweet scented vegetables that spice up the everyday meals of the Pho Hoi people. Experience a day of living and working with the local people in Tra Que vegetable village, in which you will have a chance to discover the daily life of farmers.

more_info.name: Hoi An Museum of History & Culture
more_info.location: 10B Trần Hưng Đạo, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: The Quan Yin pagoda houses this history museum that contains artifacts covering two thousand years of Hoi An culture.

more_info.name: Hoi An Museum of Trade Ceramics
more_info.location: 80 Trần Phú, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Hoi An Ceramic Museum is an indispensable destination in Hoi An's discovery journey. Not only can you see the ancient pottery and pottery in four directions, but also have the opportunity to learn more about the prosperity of the commercial port of Hoi An.

more_info.name: Precious Heritage Art Gallery Museum
more_info.location: 26 Phan Bội Châu, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: A 250m2 display of photos and artifacts collected during the last 5 years of Rehahn's exploration of Vietnam. Entrance for this cultural experience is free. English, French and Vietnamese available

shop.title: Where can I shop?
shop.desc: Hoi an is filled with places to shop from local markets to specialised stores

more_info.name: Friendly Leather Bags Shop
more_info.location: 44 Đường Phan Bội Châu, Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Friendly bags is the only one bags shop in Hoi An. We are able to make travel bags, handbags, bags for laptop or iPad and wallets to measure. In less than one day, you can receive your bags after had chosen your design and the fabric.

more_info.name: Dé Lantana Silk Lantern & Lamp
more_info.location: 35 Lý Thái Tổ, Sơn Phong, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Dé Lantana Silk Lantern & Lamp is also a reliable place for purchasing traditional as well as modern lanterns and lamps. Gorgeous lanterns are available here and all are at reasonable prices.

more_info.name: Night Market
more_info.location: Đường Nguyễn Hoàng, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Hoi An Night Market, occupying Nguyen Hoang Street in the centre of town, consists of over 50 local vendors selling a variety of local snacks, trinkets, clothing, jewellery, and accessories. Widely regarded as one of the most popular markets in Vietnam, it occupies a 300-metre-long street that overlooks Thu Bon River and is illuminated by hundreds of colourful lanterns, making a popular spot for photography as well.

more_info.name: Central Market
more_info.location: 73 Phan Bội Châu, Sơn Phong, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Resting on the banks of the Thu Bon River, bustling Hoi An Central Market is certainly worth a look for its authentic slice of Vietnamese life. The market is busy throughout the day with locals bargaining hard alongside tourists so its best to arrive first thing in the morning. The negotiating over fish usually starts around 07:00 as the fishermen drop their catch off and the market vendors and local buyers dive in to get the best fish. Be warned that it can get very messy, nevertheless it's certainly a sight not to be missed. Inside the market there are also plenty of live ducks and chickens tied together and ready for sale alongside row upon row of Vietnamese cooking ingredients. The smell can get quite strong as the day heats up and the market will also become a lot busier and louder as the day progresses. If you want to avoid this, then head to the east side and the large shed type building which houses the tailors and all manner of Asian silk and textiles.

more_info.name: Hoi An Lantern Shop
more_info.location: 424 Hùng Vương, Thanh Hà, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Hoi An Lantern will welcome you to a colorful world of beautiful lanterns with myriad products for you to choose. Friendly staff will introduce you wonderful lanterns product.

more_info.name: Couleurs d’Asie Gallery
more_info.location: 7 Nguyễn Huệ, Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: This is the 2nd gallery of Réhahn in Hoi An. In the gallery, Réhahn has displayed some of his best work with some limited editions certified by the photographer himself; also showcasing his book and variety of postcards. Once you step into an art gallery, it’s really hard to stop yourself from getting a piece of art, painted by the talented local artisans.

more_info.name: Hung Long Art Gallery
more_info.location: 105 Nguyễn Thái Học, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: This is the gallery of Nguyen Trung Viet, a talented Vietnamese artist. His shop owns an array of painting works exhibited. With taken lacquer material primarily, he blows his soul to each picture describing Vietnamese girls in charming ao dai.

more_info.name: Reaching Out Arts & Crafts
more_info.location: 103 Nguyễn Thái Học, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Reaching Out is a local business in an array of exquisitely crafted goods and gracious services. They have many authentic Vietnamese products and experiences there, such as: jewelry, living, tea and coffee. The unique items you buy or the experiences you enjoy at Reaching Out give the gift of opportunity to the skilled artisans and servers, both able bodied and the disabled.

more_info.name: Sunny Cloth Shop
more_info.location: 9 Trần Phú, Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Get a bespoke formal or casual outfit done at Hoa Nang Sunny Cloth Shop. The store offers custom-made men's and women's apparel, including business suits, formalwear, winter coats, and other clothing items.

more_info.name: A Dong Silk Tailors
more_info.location: 62 Trần Hưng Đạo, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Established in 1997, A Dong Silk is a leader in bespoke personal tailoring in Vietnam. It has earned a global reputation for delivering modern, stylish, high quality garments that fit all body types, perfectly.

hotel.title: Where can I stay?
hotel.desc: Hoi An has a large range of hotels, to enjoy you stay in comfort

more_info.name: Hoi An Hippie House
more_info.location: Tổ 5, Khối An Bang, Cẩm An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: The Hoi An Hippie House is located in Hoi An’s lovely fishing village An Bang. It consists of four casual private hippie rooms and a hippie loung.

more_info.name: Bamboo Homestay
more_info.location: Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Cẩm Châu, Vietnam, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: A quiet backyard, a cooling pool, a tranquil reading corner, and a hot latte. At Bamboo Hoi An Homestay, we shall serve you all. Just a little note to wish you a very graceful new week.

more_info.name: Almond Villa Hoi An
more_info.location: 230 Nguyễn Chí Thanh, Tân An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: The Almond Villa Hoi An is located at 230 Nguyen Chi Thanh St., in Hoi An Ancient Town. The homestay has 9 room & an outdoor pool, guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV.  A welcome drink and fresh fruit is a served while completing check in. The gardens and pool area are beautiful and the rooms spacious and clean, great breakfast. Staff are very friendly, helpful. and professional service. Wifi is available, free bikes are great, free private parking.

more_info.name: Gia Lam Villa Hoi An
more_info.location: Lý Thường Kiệt - Trần Nhân Tông, Sơn Phong, Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Quảng Nam
more_info.desc: Featuring free bikes, Gia Lam Villa Hoi An is located in Hoi An, a 15-minute walk from Assembly Hall of Chaozhou Chinese Congregation. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi. Guests can have a cocktail at the bar.

more_info.name: Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa
more_info.location: Âu Cơ, Biển Cửa Đại, Hội An, Quảng Nam
more_info.desc: The Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa has 109 rooms in a variety of sizes and styles featuring Japanese, classic French or traditional Vietnamese décor. The heart of the resort is a stunning coconut-tree fringed pool overlooking the ocean and beyond, the ideal place to simply be while away the day with refreshing cocktail in hand.

more_info.name: Ancient House Village Resort & Spa
more_info.location: Cẩm Thanh, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: We warmly welcome you to the Ancient House Village Resort and Spa, and we wish you a very peaceful, serene, and pleasant stay with us.  We hope you will enjoy our resort’s beautiful and tranquil setting, and that you will feel comfortable and close to nature.

more_info.name: Anantara Hoi An Resort
more_info.location: 1 Phạm Hồng Thái, Cẩm Châu, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: The resort's spacious split-level rooms overlook lush landscaped gardens and tranquil river. Culinary journeys are inspired by the region's varied influences through history and fresh flavours. Indigenous spa journeys revitalise in one of Hoi An’s most peaceful hideaways.

more_info.name: Hoi An Historic Hotel
more_info.location: 10 Trần Hưng Đạo, Sơn Phong, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Established in 1991, the Hoi An Hotel is admired for its location, charm, and world-class facilities. Guests can access stunning Cua Dai beach, 4km East, by hopping on a shuttle bus that runs on the fifteen minutes. It is also a quick walk to the Old Town (where clients will inevitably go to visit the tailor’s).

more_info.name: Vinh Hung Riverside Resort & Spa
more_info.location: 111 Ngô Quyền, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: We are a family run small collection of hotels and resorts. With our various types of hotels that offer amenities and services to meet your individual travel needs, it's easy to find the one that's right for your trip.

more_info.name: Hoi An Silk Marina Resort & Spa
more_info.location: 74 18 Tháng 8, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Tucked away in the heart of Hoi An and located right on the bank of Thu Bon River, Hoi An Silk Marina Resort and Spa bathes you in the atmosphere of the City of Lantern. With a fusion of graceful European and tropical Asian style, the design hotel offers all the creature comforts you could wish for in a luxury resort. And by night, it’s the perfect place to prolong the magic of Hoi An.
